title: Unable to specify user in the Quick Connect field
author: craph
body_snippet:
When I use the Quick Connect field to connect in ssh to a remote server the output says to me that is the user "Root" that is used to connect...

## Expected Behavior
It must be possible to specify the user when you want to connect via SSH

## Current Behavior
It's always the user "Root" that is used to

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)
1. Specify an IP of the remote Linux Server like that : myUser@my_IP
2. Hit enter to connect
3. You will see that is not your user but "Root"

comments.snippet:
Currently, the quick connect uses the default connection info to populate things like username/connection details. One option is to allow for overriding the behavior of the quick connect feature.

Related to #239
comments.author: sparerd
